About Me

I am a Power Systems Engineer specializing in renewable energy integration and market analysis. With a BSc in Electrical Engineering from Sharif University of Technology and ongoing PhD research at the Technical University of Madrid, I am dedicated to advancing sustainable energy solutions.

Optimal Renewable Capacity

Developed a thesis on determining the optimal capacity for renewable power plants based on global harmonic analysis.

Location

Madrid, Spain
